name: Square Only[Remake]
description:
Enjoy this modern-styled game based on Geometry Dash mechanics. Currently the original one is canceled, so i made my own :3

All levels (1-3):

Song used in-game:
- Alan Walker, K-391, Tungevaag, Mangoo - PLAY (Forever Bound Remix).
- DJVI - Moonstone.
- Step - Battle on the Bitmaker.

Original Game by GD BlackRed
Inspired by Geometry Dash by RobTopGames
